response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs. With its exceptional features and high-quality materials, it's truly a valuable asset. Given its worth to us, we're offering it to you at an exclusive price of $140. This is a great opportunity to acquire something of significant value at a competitive rate. I hope you'll find this offer compelling and look forward to your consideration.", "product_price": 140}
